overview.title: Projects Night - How to Build a ML Portfolio
overview.excerpt: Learn how to build a strong machine learning portfolio, collaborate on projects, and get feedback from fellow members.

details.title: Projects Night - How to Build a ML Portfolio
details.longDescription: Join us for Projects Night focused on building a machine learning portfolio. We'll guide you through best practices, showcase project ideas, and provide opportunities to collaborate with fellow members. Bring your ideas, get feedback, and leave with concrete steps to strengthen your portfolio!
